task_summary: Robot arm locates and approaches the scissors, avoiding an obstacle, and aligns above the target for grasp or interaction.

task_long_description.overview: A robot arm must identify the position of scissors on a cluttered tabletop while avoiding a prominent obstacle, then move to a position above the scissors, align, and make a final approach. The sequence involves perception to localize the scissors, navigation/planning to avoid collisions with objects blocking direct paths, and progressive motion refinement near the goal.
preconditions: Robot arm is initialized and ready
No objects moved unexpectedly during task
stepwise_plan: Check if scissors are visible; if not, scan workspace
Move to a safe position above scissors
Align tool toward scissors, avoiding obstacle(s)
Advance incrementally to reach scissors with obstacle avoidance
success_criteria: Robot arm is aligned above and near the scissors
No collision with obstacles during movement
failure_and_recovery: Obstacle blocks arm: re-scan, replan approach
Scissors not detected: increase scan attempts
task_long_description.termination: Arm's end-effector reaches target position above scissors or encounters unrecoverable obstruction

frame_3.now_evidence: first stable contact and alignment cue visible
frame_3.predicts_next: push actuation expected; confirms goal direction

task_instruction: avoid obstacle and reach the scissors

node_specs.description: Checks if scissors are visible to the robot
Performs raster scan for scissors, up to 3 attempts
Moves arm above the scissors by offset
Aligns end-effector near scissors with tight tolerance
Step movement along y-axis to reach scissors, aiding obstacle avoidance

failure_modes: Failed to align due to unforeseen geometry
recovery_strategy: Retry scan and detection up to 3 times
Re-align and approach with alternative trajectory
assumptions: Scissors are the intended target as per instruction and visible in frames; obstacle is present as a set of stacked books or box
No explicit grasp, only approach (last frame is pre-grasp/alignment)
MoveDelta(y,+0.05) represents fine approach to avoid obstacle contours

expected_success_criteria: Robot avoids obstacle and ends positioned above scissors
